headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MEYER, BARBARA (ROSE) NEE LANGBART

snippet: MEYER--Barbara (Rose) nee Langbart. Died on July 20 aged 93. Longtime resident of Lake Worth, FL and Eastchester, NY. Predeceased by her beloved husband Morton G. Meyer and son Andrew Rose. Survived by sons Jonathan, Richard, Steven Rose, six gran...
lead_paragraph: MEYER--Barbara (Rose) nee Langbart. Died on July 20 aged 93. Longtime resident of Lake Worth, FL and Eastchester, NY. Predeceased by her beloved husband Morton G. Meyer and son Andrew Rose. Survived by sons Jonathan, Richard, Steven Rose, six grandchildren, one great-grandchild. Donations in her memory to charity of your choice. 1/3
